channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: The best way to predict the future is to invent it
item.description: Additional context or notes about this quote can be added here, but won’t be displayed in the quote column.

item.title: The Pragmatic Programmer
item.description: A comprehensive review of this programming classic…

item.title: TIL: Hugo's Page Resources
item.description:
Today I learned that Hugo’s Page Resources feature allows you to co-locate images and other assets with your content files.

This makes it easier to organize and maintain your content, as all related files are kept together.

item.title: Working on improving the Hugo Theme Deck
item.description: Working on improving the Hugo Theme Deck documentation and adding more example posts to demonstrate different column styles. 🚀

item.title: Write Column Example
item.description:
This is a summary paragraph that will be shown in the write column card. It should be concise and informative, giving readers a quick overview of the article.

Markdown Features

Here’s a demonstration of various markdown features that work in the single post view:

Text Formatting

  • Bold text for emphasis
  • Italic text for subtle emphasis
  • Inline code for technical terms

Code Blocks

def hello_world():
    print("Hello, World!")

Lists and Quotes

  1. First item
  2. Second item
  3. Third item

This is a blockquote that shows how quotes look in the article.

item.title: 生活不是等待暴风雨过去，而是学会在雨中跳舞
item.description:
生活不是等待暴风雨过去，而是学会在雨中跳舞。

测试
